summary: AN ORDINANCE accepting easements over a portion of Navalair Addition and a portion of Section 10, Township 25 North, Range 4 East, W.M., for Traffic Signal Loop Detectors and appurtenances, accepting a deed over a portion of Section 10, Township 25 North, Range 4 East, W.M., for street purposes and laying off 40th Avenue Northeast and Sand Point Way Northeast. (Sand Point Way Northeast Median Project; RW 8410).
